messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2821
messages.msgSnippet: ... Is that Family Matters: Why Homeschooling Makes Sense, or did he write another one? And it s a nosy, probably none of my business whatsoever kind of
messages.messageBody:
1/8/03 23:15:

> We just added a David Gutterson book to our arsenal of unschooling/natural
> learning materials for our resource table at the weekly group get together.
> What a voice! The very first thing that caught my eye was how school is such
> a driving force in our society...I'll have to read more later.

Is that Family Matters: Why Homeschooling Makes Sense, or did he write
another one?

And it's a nosy, probably none of my business whatsoever kind of question,
but I've been wondering if he continued teaching high school English after
his wonderful book Snow Falling On Cedars did so well, or if he's gone to
full time writing and homeschooling these days? Just curious.

brenda
